data.name: UE5 Shooter Game
data.detailed_description:
The tab key brings up the pause menu
This is an FPS game.In this game, you will play a robot to hunt and kill other AI robots, and you can pick up some items in the map, such as food, water and so on, and use these items to increase blood and physical strength. You can also press the I key to open the backpack to see the discarded items, right mouse button to zoom in and aim, left mouse button to fire, You can also press the C key to squat behind the cover. Your final task is to kill all AI robots and then enjoy the scenes in the game freely
You can get:
1. AI Battle System
2. Detailed, well-crafted pictures
3. Experience the fun of gaming
4. Experience the characteristics of UE5
This game is a junior high school students spend a month to do, give a high praise oh!

data.short_description: The tab key brings up the pause menuThis is an FPS game.In this game you will play a robot to hunt other robots, and you can pick up some props,and use these props to increase blood volume and physical strength, right mouse button can be enlarged, the angle of view to aim, mouse, left button is fire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDA Geforce RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows11
  • Processor: Intel i9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDA Geforce RTX 2080TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card:
  • Additional Notes:
